author: ruhuasiyu
txt_content:
本帖最后由 ruhuasiyu 于 2017-12-26 17:33 编辑 

新建一个世界，将



sphere.zip
(1.77 KB, 下载次数: 15)



2017-12-26 17:24 上传
点击文件名下载附件





放入datapacks文件夹即可。
然后进入游戏输入
/function sphere:main 复制代码
即可得到一个很棒的球。





算法很简单，对rotx和roty循环即可，然后添加一个判断用于删除过近的雪球。
sphere/main.mcfunction
scoreboard objectives add rotx dummy
scoreboard objectives add roty dummy
scoreboard players set #stepx rotx 5
scoreboard players set #stepy roty 5

kill @e[type=snowball]
summon minecraft:snowball ~ ~ ~ {NoGravity:1,Tags:["as"]}
execute as @e[tag=as] at @s run function sphere:rot
复制代码

sphere/rot.mcfunction
scoreboard players set @s rotx 0
execute store result entity @s Rotation[0] float 1 run scoreboard players get @s rotx

scoreboard players operation @s roty += #stepy roty
execute store result entity @s Rotation[1] float 1 run scoreboard players get @s roty

execute as @s at @s run function sphere:rotx
execute as @s[scores={roty=..180}] at @s run function sphere:rot
复制代码

sphere/rotx.mcfunction
summon snowball ^ ^ ^10 {NoGravity:1,Tags:["a"]}
execute as @e[tag=a] at @s if entity @e[distance=..0.5,tag=!a] run kill @s
tag @e[tag=a] remove a

summon snowball ^ ^ ^-10 {NoGravity:1,Tags:["a"]}
execute as @e[tag=a] at @s if entity @e[distance=..0.5,tag=!a] run kill @s
tag @e[tag=a] remove a

scoreboard players operation @s rotx += #stepx rotx
execute store result entity @s Rotation[0] float 1 run scoreboard players get @s rotx
execute as @s[scores={rotx=..359}] at @s run function sphere:rotx
复制代码

他这个原理挺简单的
summon雪球
execute store雪球把本身的rotation_y和rotation_x输出到记分板把每次输出到记分板的rotation_y+5再通过execute把修改后的分数赋给雪球的rotation_y，达到了雪球的旋转的效果，每次旋转利用本地坐标生成一个雪球，一圈下来再把rotation_x像rotation_y那样+5再生成一圈，直到画了一个完整的球
